0 DESCRIPTION:
What is the project and why should you care?
Symphony Solutions is an international Dutch IT company with offices in Ukraine, Macedonia, Poland, Belgium, the USA, and the Netherlands. We have been on the market for more than 10 years already and preserve unique cultures within all our locations.
At Symphony Solutions we have removed all possible barriers created by the traditional organization and embraced organic principles and a high degree of self-management. We believe this kind of organization is the optimal environment to attract and retain the best talents, fully develop them, and leverage their potential.
If you can develop and execute fact-based analytics from the web and digital channels, as well as fuel our SEO/SEM strategy. If you are agile in spirit and facile with content management systems, you might just love the Symphony Solutions Marketing Team.
You would be a great fit for this position if you:
- At least 3+ years in a role
- English level B2+
- Skills of half-marketer, half-data-analyst-geek who can translate numbers into meaningful insights
- Solid understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking methods
- Experience in SEO & Web analytics tools (Ahrefs, SemRush, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Data Studio, etc.) and knowledge of how to set up the needed dashboards to track traffic acquisition, lead velocity, and keyword rankings
- Ability to complete competitive analysis of other companies within the industry
- Experience in working with Web analytics to provide digestible marketing insights for different teams depending on what input is valuable for them
- Skills in extracting data, compiling reports, creating/optimizing processes for web data management and data analysis
- Deep knowledge about HTML/CSS and technical aspects of SEO, and able to speak the same language with the dev team to ensure all the technical requirements are implemented
- Good reporting skills to present the metrics with insights and action items
- A self-driven approach with a sense of a deadline and ownership
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills (email, phone, etc.)
Is a plus:
- Analytical and problem-solving mindset
- Ability to adapt and shift focus quickly
- Enough drive to take the initiative for tasks and motivated to see projects through
- Experience with other aspects of marketing, such as customer growth and promotion
- Experience in iGaming and Software industries
- Here are all the things you’ll get to do on the project:
- Develop optimization strategies that increase the company’s search engine results rankings
- Regular audits, technical SEO reviews, related issues, recommended fixes, and best practices for improvement
- On-site & Off-site SEO strategies & tactics implementation to support various context mixes and assets that require optimization
- Set measurable goals that demonstrate improvement in marketing efforts
- Monitor daily performance metrics to understand SEO strategy performance
- Perform competitive research
- Collaborate with the in-house dev team on technical and on-page improvements to make sure our website development takes SEO into account in the planning stage, not as an aftermath
- Work with optimizing website content, landing pages, and paid search copy to support integrated digital campaigns
- Identify needed data points, align with company-wide metrics, and build a comprehensive outcomes-based analytics framework to track, justify, and amplify marketing ROI and influence on client’s business
- Analyze data and define success, failure, or possible improvements in the performance of different marketing integrated campaigns and tactics, as well as (helping) translate numbers into insights and action items
- Support other marketing specialists with ad hoc tasks according to the needs of the team and SEO strategy

You have:
● Fluent communication skills in English and Finnish
● Expert-level knowledge of Google Cloud Platform (AWS and/or Azure is a plus)
● Background as Linux OR Windows system administrator or backend developer would be ideal
● Coding/scripting skills (Bash, Python, etc.)
● Hands-on experience in creating solution architectures, as well as designing and implementing landing zone architectures
● Infrastructure as a Code skill (i.e. CDK, Terraform, Deployment Manager, and similar)
● Experience in building CI/CD pipelines and container technologies (e.g. Docker)
● At least theoretical knowledge of container orchestration technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Swarm, or OpenShift)
● Willingness to experiment with and learn brand-new technologies (e.g. Anthos)
● Knowledge of on-premises technologies (e.g. VMware, OpenStack, or Hyper-V)
● Knowledge of security, network, virtualization, load balancers, storage, and databases
● Experience or interest in learning more about Big Data / Machine Learning projects is an asset
● An active customer-oriented consultancy mindset and pre-sales attitude are a must All in all, you have a solid engineering or technical background with hands-on experience in conceptualizing, strategizing, and architecting cloud solutions. As you work with customers, solid social skills are a must.
You will get:
● A highly skilled multinational team
● Individual training budget and exam fees for partner certifications (Azure, AWS, GCP) and additional certification bonus covered by Nordcloud
● Access to join and the possibility to create knowledge-sharing sessions within a community of leading cloud professionals
● Flexible working hours and freedom to choose your tools (laptop and smartphone) and ways of working
● Freedom to work fully remotely within the country of Finland
● Local benefits such as extensive private health care and insurance, wellness benefits
You will also:
● Participate in customer projects from new infrastructure builds and migrations to big data
● Be a trusted advisor for high-profile enterprises and jointly manage the customer relationship and roadmap with the Nordcloud Sales team
● See through customer projects from start to release

0 DESCRIPTION:
ABOUT THE JOB
Gunzilla Games is looking for a Senior Gameplay Programmer. The person in this position will help develop and support various gameplay features (e.g. movement, shooting), gameplay entities (e.g. kill zones, rockets, bombs), and AI-related features (e.g. AI-specific weapons, behaviors) for our AAA title as well as collaborate with game designers to design and implement the game features from scratch.
RESPONSIBILITIES
As a Gameplay Programmer, you will:
- Design and develop the core gameplay features and systems for our game
- Work closely with artists and designers to iterate on the gameplay mechanics
- Contribute ideas and feedback toward all aspects of the game
- Maintain and optimize the existing game systems
- Work on AI behaviors and AI-related features
- Document and extend the documentation on the gameplay features and systems
- Self-manage programming tasks and coordinate them with the production team
REQUIREMENTS
- Excellent C++ knowledge with 5+ years of professional experience
- Strong 3D math knowledge (vectors, matrices, Linear Algebra)
- Worked in the game dev industry and shipped game titles
- Can self-manage tasks and complete features from scratch
- Passion for playing and making games
- Strong understanding of software engineering practices
Good understanding of:
- Network programming
- Multithreading and parallel programming
- OS internals (process/thread/memory management)
- How CPUs and GPUs work
- Self-motivated, strong work ethic, and able to work independently
GUNZILLA OFFERS
- Flexible Working & Work from Home
- Health Insurance
- Revenue Based Bonuses
- English / German Courses
- 25 Annual Paid Vacation & Sick Days
- Public Transportation
- Relocation & Accommodation Support
- Office Perks & Gym Membership

✨✨✨Вітання!✨✨✨
Нумо знайомитися? :)
Ми — продуктова команда Boosters, і ми створюємо продукти, які покращують життя людей і несуть реальну цінність. Зараз у нас є 4 продукти, давай докладно розповім про них:
Promova
— додаток для вивчення іноземних мов (входить у топ-10 мовних додатків у світі)
Avrora
— додаток для покращення сну (топ-5 додатків H&F у понад 82 країнах)
Manifest
— додаток з афірмаціями (більше 22 тисяч репостів наших афірмацій)
RiseSpace
— платформа з лайф коучами, це наш новий напрямок (реліз був у грудні 2021)
Наша головна перевага — це люди. Люди, які націлені на те, щоб бути кращими за себе вчорашнього і перемагати разом. Наразі у нас в команді вже 75 людей, і ми не плануємо зупинятися.
Зараз ми шукаємо
PPC-specialist-a (Google Ads)
який(а) створить ефективну стратегію залучення користувачів за допомогю Google Ads для продуктів well-being екосистеми RiseSpace (RiseSpace, Avrora, Manifest) в рамках поставлених бізнес-цілей.
У тебе будуть такі завдання:
- Планування та реалізація стратегії залучення користувачів за допомогю Google Ads
- Генерація ідей для нових тестів, A/B тестування
- Моніторінг ефективності роботи кампаній, оптимізація їх показників ефективності
Необхідні навички:
- 2+ роки досвіду роботи з залученням користувачів за допомогою Google Search / Google UAC з великими бюджетами
- Досвід з налаштування аналітики та роботи з кастомними репортами (Google Analytics, Firebase)
- Досвід роботи з Tableau, Amplitude
- Досвід проведення A/B тестування, аналізу його результатів
- Знання англійської на рівні не нижче Upper-Intermediate
Буде перевагою, якщо ти:
- Знаєш інші іноземні мови
- Знаєш останні тренди digital маркетингу
- Маєш досвід роботи на Tier 1 ринках (US, AU, CA)
- Маєш досвід з просуванням мобільних додатків
Що ми пропонуємо?
- Роботу в команді професіоналів та з аудиторією більше одного мільйону в місяць
- Філософію та умови для твого постійного росту та розвитку
- Великий простір для втілення власних ідей і впливу на продукт
Також, ми пропонуємо такі бенефіти:
- Корпоративний лікар та медичне страхування
- Допомога з релокейтом для співробітника та сім’ї
- Компенсація додаткового навчання на зовнішніх тренінгах і семінарах та Business і Management School для співробітників
- Велика електронна бібліотека та доступ до платних онлайн-курсів і конференцій, внутрішні бесіди і воркшопи, курси англійської
Last but not least:
- Буде можливість самостійно побудувати стратегії залучення користувачів за допомогою Google — повністю продумуваати стратегію та реалізувати ії на практиці, проводити безліч тестів з максимальним рівнем автономності
- Можливість росту: до Google Media Buying Team Lead
- Процес інтервʼю: Pre-screen (30 хвилин) ➡️ Тестове завдання ➡️ Інтервʼю з СМО (1,5 години) ➡️ Bar-raising (1,5 години)
Залишай своє резюме і приєднуйся до Boosters!

REQUIREMENTS:
- 1+ years of experience in IT Recruitment
- Hands-on interviewing experience
- Technical expertise with an ability to understand and explain job requirements for IT roles
- Familiarity with Applicant Tracking Systems and resume databases
- Solid knowledge of sourcing techniques (social media recruiting and Boolean search)
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills
- At least Upper-Intermediate level of English (B2-C1)
- Sense of initiative, attention to details and good communication skills
RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Full life-cycle of recruiting for open positions
- Write and post technical job descriptions
- Perform pre-screening calls to analyze applicants' abilities
- Coordinate with Interviews with technical interviewers, collect feedback
WE OFFER:
- Remote or coworking (paid by company)
- Competitive motivation scheme based on your performance
- 20 working days of paid vacation compensation
- Free English classes
